厬字的基本解释

厬
guǐ
旁出的泉水：“厬泉自出，环流镜清。”
干涸。

厬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǐ］
［《廣韻》居洧切，上旨，見。］
(1)（泉流）侧出。
(2)涸竭。

厬字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【厂字部】　厬； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页162第47
【唐韻】居洧切【集韻】【韻會】矩鮪切【正韻】古委切，?音軌。【爾雅·釋水】水醮曰厬。【註】謂水醮盡。【疏】凡水之盡，皆謂之厬。厬則竭涸之一名也。【韻會】一曰水厓枯土也。【禮·韻舊註】泉側出，誤。

厬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
厬字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Baby
guǐ
The spring water coming out: "The spring comes out of its own accord, and the circulation mirror is clear."
Dry up.
Baby
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guǐ］
["Guangyun" is very close, the decrement, see you. ]
(1) (Spring Stream) exits sideways.
(2) Exhaustion.

[Subset 2] [Factory Word Department] 　厬; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 162-47
[Tang Yun] Ju Wei cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Rectangle cut [Zheng Yun] Ancient Wei cut,? Audio track. [Erya·Shui Shui] The water glutinous rice is said to be a servant. [Note] It means that the water is exhausted. 【Sparse】All the water is exhausted, it is called the nursery. She is exhausted one name.
